examples:
What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Your customer service suck. I am sòooooooo disappointed! I just want to stop using Canva right now and not recommend you at all :(
What kind of problem is there ?: Explain your other problem: Do not stop sending the same message and give a solution, how do you go to the new version without my incident? give call <NUMBER>

Describe your issue: Hi there, I am having issues with canva.live. It has stopped working.I have cleared browsers, and cookies with no luck. Hoping you can help. <NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Can I stop my service please

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I  would like to stop my Canva account please

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: hi
i am getting transaction detection  from canva , how can i stop it ?

Describe your issue: I would like to stop my trial with canva


What kind of problem?: Other

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I have few canva accounts, one of which i'm being billed for however, I am not using the account at all. And I only vaguely remember the account that it could be coming from (like the username/email  and password), however, I do have to card number that the money is being taken from. I would like to stop the subscription altogether as I am not using it. It would be greatly appreciated if someone could look into this. Thank you.
What type of problem?: Other Describe your problem: how do I stop my account during the trial period? Thank you
What do you need help with?: I do not want this program after the 30 days. How do I stop the charge to my account?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I want to stop being billed, how do I do that?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: We are no longer using Canva and wish to stop our subscription.

Describe your issue: i want stop using canva

What did you have a problem with?: Canva Pro

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Keep getting charged 3 times now and no subscriptions are active. I've tried finding a way to stop and it doesn't work!!! Please STOP charging!!!! ✋

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, 
I need to stop payments from an account that I no longer have access to but still billing me, please help.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Stop billing my account. Cancel subscription

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I want to stop my subscription

I want to stop my membership. Let me know how to do that

Thank you

Kind <NAME>

<NAME>

SERIOUSLY GIVE ME ALL MY MONEY BACK ALREADY STOP CHARGING THIS CARD RIGHT NOW!

Describe your issue: In the animation, how do we make it stop after the first animation?

Describe your issue: I have asked you on numerous occasions to stop charging my card and for a refund.  I will be contacting the better business bureau.

Describe your issue: PLEASE STOP AUTOMATICALLY ATTACHING A BACKGROUND PICTURE!!!!!! I CAN'T WORK LIKE THIS!!!!

Describe your issue: Keeps stopping really hard to use
What kind of assistance do you need? : I want to stop payment
What type of problem?: Other Describe your problem: Hello, I want to stop the CANVA PRO trial, but a bug is persistent. Please stop the trial subscription for me. cordially

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Due to Covid restrictions and loss of business we need to stop using Canva for a 3 month period  and wish to susupend our account - Is this possible?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: You are charging me for months and I want to stop it.  THere is no button on my account to do so

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: The font "Lovelo" is missing key characters such as the letter "O" and the full stop.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Dear Support,

I have used Canva and it served me very well for my studies and for doing professional documents.  I have now finished my Masters and would like to stop the subscription.  I wanted to ask, once I stop the subscription, will I lose access to the documents I created?  Or will I just be unable to create new ones?

Best Regards
Adrian
